enWisdom: The sagacious person’s friend is truth and his enemy is falsehood

Wisdom: خَالِفْ مَنْ خَالَفَ الْحَقَّ إِلَى غَيْرِهِ وَدَعْهُ وَمَا رَضِيَ لِنَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: Oppose the one who opposes the truth for falsehood; and leave him and that which he has chosen for himself

Wisdom: عَوْدُكَ إِلَى الْحَقِّ خَيْرٌ مِنْ تَمَادِيكَ فِي الْبَاطِلِ
enWisdom: Your return to the truth is better than your persisting in falsehood

Wisdom: فَارِقْ مَنْ فَارَقَ الْحَقَّ إِلَى غَيْرِهِ وَدَعْهُ وَمَا رَضِيَ لِنَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: Abandon the one who has abandoned the truth for other than it, and leave him and that which he has preferred for himself
Be generous with the truth and miserly with falsehood

Wisdom: كُنْ عَالِماً بِالْحَقِّ عَامِلًا بِهِ يُنْجِكَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Be knowledgeable about the truth and act upon it, [and through this] Allah, the Glorified, will save you

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحَبُّ الْأُمُورِ إِلَيْكَ أَعَمَّهَا فِي الْعَدْلِ‏ وَ أَقْسَطَهَا بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: Let the most beloved matters to you be the most universal in justice and the most equitable with [regards to the] rights [of others]

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ مَوْئِلُكَ إِلَى الْحَقِّ فَإِنَّ الْحَقَّ أَقْوَى مُعِينٍ
enWisdom: Let your refuge be the truth, for verily truth is the strongest supporter

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ مَرْجِعُكَ إِلَى الْحَقِّ فَمَنْ فَارَقَ الْحَقَّ هَلَكَ
enWisdom: Let your recourse be to the truth, for indeed truth is the best companion
How good a guide truth is!

Wisdom: لَا يُؤْنِسَنَّكَ إِلَّا الْحَقُّ وَلَا يُوحِشَنَّكَ إِلَّا الْبَاطِلُ
enWisdom: Let nothing make you feel at ease but the truth and let nothing make you uneasy except falsehood

Wisdom: لَا تَمْنَعَنَّكُمْ رِعَايَةُ الْحَقِّ لِأَحَدٍ عَنْ إِقَامَةِ الْحَقِّ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Let not your attention towards the rights of a person [who is close to you] prevent you from establishing justice against him
There is no messenger more conveying than the truth
One who argues by truth is not defeated
